question_text: What is the primary role of a printer driver?
answer_options: It controls the speed of the network interface
It manages power supply levels for the printer
It translates data from the operating system into a format the printer understands
It installs firmware updates on the printer
correct_answer: It translates data from the operating system into a format the printer understands
explanation: Printer drivers are responsible for converting print jobs from the operating system into instructions the printer can understand and render.
